description: Smallest palindrome with digit sum = n.
links: R. J. Mathar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..88
example: 191 is the smallest palindrome to have digits sum to 11.a(28) = 5995 and no palindrome less than 5995 has digit sum 28.
prog: (PARI) ispal(n) = my(d=digits(n)); Vecrev(d)==d;a(n) = {k = 0; while ((sumdigits(k) != n) || !ispal(k), k++); k;} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Aug 20 2015
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Jun 27 2001
